title: B2B2C Marketplace Manager - Sports Equipment
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: B2B2C Marketplace Manager Posted/Updated: 10-19-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsible for hitting specific sales targets for the marketplaces. Work closely with the eCommerce Merchandising and Marketing teams to leverage products, campaigns, and promotional opportunities.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
